query_description: Weekly Vote Volume Trends and Reputation Growth Patterns

observations.finding: Weekly upvote volume remained relatively stable (230K-240K per week) for the first 12 weeks, with a sharp 10.17% drop in the final week (2022-09-19).
Approximately 1.9-2.0 million reputation points are created across all users each week. This represents ~280K reputation-affecting votes generating net positive reputation.
The up/down ratio remained in a narrow band of 6.05-6.49 across all weeks, indicating a stable voting culture. Week of 2022-09-12 had the lowest ratio (6.05).
Most weeks show WoW changes between -3% and +3%, except the final week with -10.17% drop (likely partial week or data cutoff).
